1.name: Il buono, il brutto, il cattivo
1.description: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

2.name: The Professionals
2.description: An arrogant Texas millionaire hires four adventurers to rescue his kidnapped wife from a notorious Mexican bandit.

3.name: Persona
3.description: A nurse is put in charge of a mute actress and finds that their personae are melding together.

4.name: Grand Prix
4.description: American Grand Prix driver Pete Aron is fired by his Jordan-BRM racing team after a crash at Monaco that injures his British teammate, Scott Stoddard.

5.name: Blowup
5.description: A mod London photographer finds something very suspicious in the shots he has taken of a mysterious beauty in a desolate park.

6.name: Voyna i mir
6.description: Eight-hour epic based on the book of the same name by Leo Tolstoy. Two main story-lines are complex and intertwined. One is the love story of young Countess Natasha Rostova and Count Pierre...                See full summary »

7.name: Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf?
7.description: A bitter, aging couple, with the help of alcohol, use a young couple to fuel anguish and emotional pain towards each other.

8.name: Andrei Rublev
8.description: The life, times and afflictions of the fifteenth-century Russian iconographer.

9.name: Promise Her Anything
9.description: A young lady has been widowed and left with a baby son to bring up alone. She decides that the baby needs a father figure and decides to marry a psychologist. She hides her son with an ...                See full summary »

10.name: Nevada Smith
10.description: A half American Indian and half white teenager evolves into a hardened killer as he tracks down his parents' murderers.

11.name: Manos: The Hands of Fate
11.description: A family gets lost on the road and stumbles upon a hidden, underground, devil-worshiping cult led by the fearsome Master and his servant Torgo.

12.name: Fahrenheit 451
12.description: In an oppressive future, a fireman whose duty is to destroy all books begins to question his task.

13.name: Fantastic Voyage
13.description: A scientist is nearly assassinated. In order to save him, a submarine is shrunken to microscopic size and injected into his blood stream with a small crew. Problems arise almost as soon as they enter the bloodstream.

14.name: La battaglia di Algeri
14.description: In the 1950s, fear and violence escalate as the people of Algiers fight for independence from the French government.

15.name: Seconds
15.description: An unhappy middle-aged banker agrees to a procedure that will fake his death and give him a completely new look and identity - one that comes with its own price.

16.name: Harper
16.description: Lew Harper, a cool private investigator, is hired by a wealthy California matron to locate her kidnapped husband.

17.name: Django
17.description: A coffin-dragging gunslinger and a half-breed prostitute become embroiled in a bitter feud between a Klan of Southern racists and a band of Mexican Revolutionaries.

18.name: One Million Years B.C.
18.description: Prehistoric man Tumak is banished from his savage tribe and meets pretty Loana who belongs to a gentler coastal tribe but he must fight caveman Payto to win her favors.

19.name: The Trouble with Angels
19.description: Two high-spirited young students at St. Francis Academy For Girls keep things hopping for the challenged Mother Superior and her staff of bewildered Sisters.

20.name: Batman: The Movie
20.description: The Dynamic Duo faces four supervillains who plan to hold the world for ransom with the help of a secret invention that instantly dehydrates people.

21.name: The Chase
21.description: The escape of Bubber Reeves from prison affects the inhabitants of a small Southern town.

22.name: A Man for All Seasons
22.description: The story of Sir Thomas More, who stood up to King Henry VIII when the King rejected the Roman Catholic Church to obtain a divorce and remarry.

23.name: A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to the Forum
23.description: A wily slave must unite a virgin courtesan and his young smitten master to earn his freedom.

24.name: Stagecoach
24.description: On the stagecoach to Cheyenne, a mixed group of passengers must work together to survive the arduous journey and the Indian attacks.

25.name: Texas Across the River
25.description: In 1845 Texas, a Louisiana belle is courted by a wanted Spanish nobleman and a Texas brawling gunrunner but her suitors' passionate duel is interrupted by the cavalry and a Comanche attack.

26.name: The Sand Pebbles
26.description: In 1926, a U.S. Naval engineer gets assigned to a gunboat on a rescue mission in war-torn China.

27.name: The Black Klansman
27.description: After a black man's daughter is killed by the KKK, he seeks revenge by becoming a Klansman.

28.name: Cast a Giant Shadow
28.description: In 1947, following the U.N. decision to split British Palestine into separate Jewish and Palestinian states, a former U.S. Army officer is recruited by the Jews to reorganize the Haganah.

29.name: The Glass Bottom Boat
29.description: After a series of misunderstandings, the head of an aerospace research laboratory begins to suspect his new girlfriend is a Russian spy.

30.name: Gunpoint
30.description: A young, determined sheriff and his posse chase a gang of murderous train robbers, and a kidnapped woman into New Mexico.

31.name: How to Steal a Million
31.description: Romantic comedy about a woman who must steal a statue from a Paris museum to help conceal her father's art forgeries, and the man who helps her.

32.name: Au hasard Balthazar
32.description: The story of a mistreated donkey and the people around him. A study on saintliness and a sister piece to Bresson's Mouchette.

33.name: Alfie
33.description: An unrepentant ladies' man gradually begins to understand the consequences of his lifestyle.

34.name: The Ghost and Mr. Chicken
34.description: Luther Heggs aspires to be a reporter for his small town newspaper, the Rachel Courier Express. He gets his big break when the editor asks him to spend the night at the Simmons mansion that...                See full summary »

35.name: Le spie vengono dal semifreddo
35.description: Disgraced SIC agent Bill Dexter teams up with bumbling doormen Franco and Ciccio to stop Dr. Goldfoot from using his bikini-clad robot girls to blow up high-ranking NATO generals, igniting a war between Russia and America.

36.name: The Russians Are Coming the Russians Are Coming
36.description: Without hostile intent, a Soviet submarine runs aground off New England. Men are sent for a boat, but many villagers go into a tizzy, risking bloodshed.

37.name: The Group
37.description: In June 1933, eight young women, who are close friends and members of the upper-class group at South Tower College, graduate and start their adult lives. The film documents the years ...                See full summary »

38.name: Un homme et une femme
38.description: A widow and a widower find their relationship developing into love, but their past tragedies prove hard to overcome, causing them to proceed with utmost delicacy.

39.name: Paris brûle-t-il?
39.description: The departure of the German Army from Paris in 1944.

40.name: The Witches
40.description: Following a horrifying experience with the occult in Africa, a schoolteacher moves to a small English village, only to discover that black magic resides there as well.

41.name: Cul-de-sac
41.description: In search of help, two wounded gangsters on the run find refuge in the secluded castle of a feeble man and his wife; however, under the point of a gun, nothing is what it seems.

42.name: A Big Hand for the Little Lady
42.description: Comedy western in which a traveler bets more money than he can afford in a poker game, and unusual events follow.

43.name: Torn Curtain
43.description: An American scientist publicly defects to East Germany as part of a cloak and dagger mission to find the solution for a formula resin before planning an escape back to the West.

44.name: The Silencers
44.description: Retired agent Matt Helm is re-activated in order to stop an evil organization from exploding an atom bomb over the USA and starting WWIII.

45.name: The Fortune Cookie
45.description: A crooked lawyer persuades his brother-in-law to feign a serious injury.

46.name: This Property Is Condemned
46.description: The dramatic love story of small-town Mississippi girl Alva Starr and railroad official Owen Legate, set during the Great Depression.

47.name: Tanin no kao
47.description: A businessman with a disfigured face obtains a lifelike mask from his doctor, but the mask starts altering his personality.

48.name: Georgy Girl
48.description: A homely but vivacious young woman dodges the amorous attentions of her father's middle-aged employer while striving to capture some of the glamorous life of her swinging London roommate.

49.name: Our Man Flint
49.description: When scientists use eco-terrorism to impose their will on the world by affecting extremes in the weather, Intelligence Chief Cramden calls in top agent Derek Flint.

50.name: Masculin féminin
50.description: A romance between young Parisians, shown through a series of vignettes.
